mapper.insert: insert into team_members (t_id, userid, username, usertype, is_tibu) values (#{tId},#{userid},#{username},#{usertype},#{isTibu});
mapper.select: select * from team_members where t_id = #{tId} and putin != 1;
select usertype from team_members where userid = #{userid} and t_id = #{tId}
select * from team_members where t_id = #{tId} and usertype = #{usertype}
mapper.update: update team_members set usertype = #{usertype} where userid = #{userid} and t_id = #{tId}
update team_members set username = #{username} where userid = #{userid} and t_id = #{tId}
mapper.delete: delete from team_members where userid = #{userid} and t_id = #{tId}
